snippet.title: Tribute || Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Tribute is a fast-paced roguelike adventure where you play as a determined father trapped in a cycle of death and vengeance, striving to rescue his son and uncover the dark truth behind their endless torment. With every life taken, grow stronger and delve deeper into a story of loss, redemption, and the true cost of your choices.

Wishlist it now on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2902090/Tribute/
